content.title: Behavioral Risk: Impulsivity
content.summary: Pressure periods may trigger speed-over-clarity decisions.
content.analysis: The cost profile rises when urgency bypasses verification.
content.implication: A mandatory pause protocol lowers cascading errors.

content.title: Behavioral Risk: Overcontrol
content.summary: Under uncertainty, there is a tendency to over-manage variables.
content.analysis: Excess control can convert ambiguity into avoidable delay.
content.implication: Predefined action thresholds improve pace and confidence.

content.title: Behavioral Risk: Elevated Signal Intensity
content.summary: One or more risk channels show elevated intensity.
content.analysis: When signal strength rises, behavior becomes less forgiving of noise.
content.implication: Short-cycle monitoring and escalation rules are recommended.
